snippet: The name of Brewers slugger Ryan Braun is said to be on records from the shuttered clinic that is under investigation for distributing performance-enhancing drugs.
abstract: Milwaukee Brewers left fielder Ryan Braun is reportedly named in documents from defunct anti-aging clinic Biogenesis of America, which is under investigation for distributing performance-enhancing drugs.

byline.contributor: Steve Eder and David Waldstein contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The name of Brewers slugger Ryan Braun is said to be on records from the shuttered clinic that is under investigation for distributing performance-enhancing drugs.

headline.seo: Report Links Ryan Braun to Florida Clinic Under Scrutiny by Baseball
headline.main: A Report Links Braun to a Florida Clinic Under Scrutiny by Baseball
headline.print_headline: A Report Links Braun to a Florida Clinic Under Scrutiny by Baseball
